alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lee, northern Clarendon and central Sumter Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mulberry, or near Sumter, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumter, South Sumter, Mulberry, Woods Bay State Park, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Elliott, Mayesville, Lynchburg, Oswego, Lakewood, Privateer, East Sumter, St. Charles, Shiloh and Cane Savannah. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 135 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
